channel.title: Version 5.24 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.24.0 (2024-02-28) Hugo 0.112.4 0.112.4 This release requires a newer Hugo version. Change Change The topbar button received a way to add text next to the icon. For this, the original title option was renamed to hint while the new title option is now displayed next to the icon.
